text: Andra Martin (born Sandra Rehn, July 15, 1935 â€“ May 3, 2022) was an American actress. She was known for being in Warner Bros. movies during the 1950s and 1960s. She was born in Rockford, Illinois. She was known for her roles in The Thing That Couldn't Die, Up Periscope and Yellowstone Kelly. Martin died on May 3, 2022, at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Rockford, Illinois
title: Andra Martin
